entities.name: nimbus
entities.description: Nimbus is mentioned as a person who played for Gryffindor last year with special permission from Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who gave Nimbus special permission to play for Gryffindor.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as a team that Nimbus played for last year with special permission from Dumbledore.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as the one who is examining a shelf full of skulls and talking about Harry Potter.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the hero who made the Dark Lord disappear and has a scar on his forehead.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is mentioned as someone who was defeated by Harry Potter.

entities.name: borgin
entities.description: Borgin is mentioned as a stooping man with greasy hair who appeared behind the counter and greeted Malfoy.

entities.name: skulls
entities.description: Skulls are mentioned as something that Malfoy is examining on a shelf.

relationships.description: Dumbledore gave Nimbus special permission to play for Gryffindor last year.
Malfoy is a customer and Borgin is the salesperson at the shop where they are talking.
Harry Potter defeated the Dark Lord.
